amendment.description: To clarify religious freedom training requirements for Foreign Service officers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5176 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5176 proposed by Senator Portman for Senator Corker to Amendment SA 5175. (consideration: CR S7127; text: CR S7127) To clarify religious freedom training requirements for Foreign Service officers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5176 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5176 proposed by Senator Portman for Senator Corker to Amendment SA 5175.
